original_text: I tell you this: Everywhere in the world people will speak about this good news. At the same time, they will also tell people about the good thing that this woman has done. And so people will remember her.’
korean_text: 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 온 천하에 어디서든지 이 복음이 전파되는 곳에서는 이 여자가 행한 일도 말하여 그를 기억하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Everywhere in the world people will speak about this good news.
At the same time, they will also tell people
about the good thing that this woman has done.
And so people will remember her.'
